Welcome to MECH3895 Individual Mechatronics and Robotics Project - Pipe Robot Exploration’s documentation!¶

A Level 3 Mechatronics and Robotics Project by Sam Wilson. This project aims to simulate robotic agents exploring a pipe network, and to use this simulation to explore the effects of different method of swarm control on the efficiency and effectiveness of the exploration.
